'''Ond''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Ond is the captain of a Purple Foxes galleon called ''[The Fortune](/theFortune/)''.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =His ship will randomly attack you near the [Kua o Rikuhu Islands](/kuaORikuhuIslands/).
}}
